content.en: Nuclear reactor simulations: Scientists have been using various algorithms to solve complex problems in nuclear reactor simulations. For example, the FINFOR-SQR code uses an algorithm to solve the steady state multigroup neutron diffusion equation. Another algorithm, implemented in the AGENT code system, accurately models neutron interactions in complex reactor domains. Additionally, the COMSOL Multiphysics simulation tool utilizes an algorithm for neutronics modeling of the high flux isotope reactor. These algorithms play a crucial role in improving our understanding of nuclear reactors and ensuring their safe and efficient operation.
content.da: Nuklear reaktor simuleringer: Forskere har brugt forskellige algoritmer til at løse komplekse problemer i nuklear reaktor simuleringer. For eksempel bruger FINFOR-SQR koden en algoritme til at løse den stationære multigruppe neutron diffusionsligning. En anden algoritme, implementeret i AGENT kodensystemet, modellerer præcist neutron interaktioner i komplekse reaktordomæner. Derudover anvender COMSOL Multiphysics simulationsværktøjet en algoritme til neutronik-modellering af højflux isotop reaktoren. Disse algoritmer spiller en afgørende rolle i forbedringen af vores forståelse af nuklear reaktorer og sikrer deres sikre og effektive drift.
